data.name: Simon Said
data.description:
**Let's play a game of Simon says!**
	
-Simon says, "Remember every pattern I tell you!"
	
-Simon says, "Be ready to remember them backwards!"
	
-"Do things Simon doesn't tell you to do!"
	
-Simon says, "When I say 'Done! [color]' tell me how many times we used [color]!"

-Simon says, "When I tell you to 'Repeat! [n]' tell me pattern [n]!"
	
	
  
***Input:***
```
"Simon says: B R G" > you remember: "B R G"


"Simon says: 1 R R B" > you remember: "B R G R R B"


"1 2 B B B R R G" > you remember:
	

"Simon says: 2' 1" > you remember: "B R R G R B B R G"
	

"Simon says: Repeat! 3" > you reply: "B R R G R B B R G"
	

"Simon says: Done! Blue" > you reply: 6```

  
*Notes:*
    
-The ' character means to remember backwards, only connected to numbers
    
-All test cases will be valid, don't worry about invalid formatting
    
-Test cases will only use R, G, and B but you can test for other colors to ensure your solution is expandable.
